sentences.en: For the bullet hole part it's really simple, we use an Emboss with these settings.
sentences.cn: 子弹孔部分的样式设置很简单, 我们在这里用了浮雕的效果.

sentences.en: Sticking and stitching tongue emboss Sticking and stitching vamp.
sentences.cn: 贴车舌面烙印商标:贴车后套商标.

sentences.en: Use the image below for the values of the Bevel and Emboss.
sentences.cn: 用这个底层的图片为斜面与浮雕设置值.

words.tran_cn: 使凸出；在……上作浮雕图案；装饰

trans.tran_cn: 饰以浮饰, 使浮雕出来
trans.tran_en: to mould or carve (a decoration or design) on (a surface) so that it is raised above the surface in low relief

trans.tran_cn: 装饰，浮雕（图案），压印浮凸字体（或图案），凹凸印
